resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107115</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200454</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Animals Between the Sand Grains - Meiofauna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tiere zwischen den Sand-Körnern - Meiofauna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animaux entre les grains de sable - Meiofauna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animais entre as grões da areia - Meiofauna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animali fra i grani della sabbia - Meiofauna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζώα μεταξύ των σιταριών άμμου - Meiofauna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animales entre los granos de la arena - Meiofauna</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lab activity, students will observe the minute animals that live between sand grains. The activity includes a list of materials, procedures, and discussion question. It is supplemented with reference images and a list of species and their phyla, including Gastrotrichicha, Crustacea/Ostracoda, Crustacea/Copepoda/Harpacticoidea, Nematoda, Turbellaria, Nemertina, Archiannelida, Polychaeta, and Oligochaeta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Laboraktivität beobachten 
Kursteilnehmer die minuziösen Tiere, die zwischen Sandkörnern leben.
Die Aktivität schließt eine Liste der Materialien, der 
Prozeduren und der Diskussion Frage ein. Sie wird mit 
Bezugsbildern und eine Liste der Sorte und ihres phyla, 
einschließlich Gastrotrichicha, des Crustacea/Ostracoda, des 
Crustacea/Copepoda/Harpacticoidea, des Nematoda, des Turbellaria, des 
Nemertina, des Archiannelida, des Polychaeta und des Oligochaeta 
ergänzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité de laboratoire, les 
étudiants observeront les petits animaux qui vivent entre les grains 
de sable. L'activité inclut une liste de matériaux, de 
procédures, et de question de discussion. Elle est complétée 
avec des images de référence et une liste d'espèces et leur 
phyla, y compris Gastrotrichicha, Crustacea/Ostracoda, 
Crustacea/Copepoda/Harpacticoidea, Nematoda, Turbellaria, Nemertina, 
Archiannelida, Polychaeta, et Oligochaeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade do laboratório, os estudantes 
observarão os animais minuciosos que vivem entre grões da areia. 
A atividade inclui uma lista dos materiais, dos procedimentos, e
da pergunta da discussão. É suplementada com as imagens da 
referência e uma lista da espécie e o seu phyla, including 
Gastrotrichicha, o Crustacea/Ostracoda, o 
Crustacea/Copepoda/Harpacticoidea, o Nematoda, o Turbellaria, o 
Nemertina, o Archiannelida, o Polychaeta, e o Oligochaeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività del laboratorio, gli allievi 
osserveranno gli animali minuscoli che vivono fra i grani della 
sabbia. L'attività include una lista dei materiali, delle 
procedure e della domanda di discussione. È completata con le 
immagini di riferimento e una lista della specie ed il loro phyla, 
compreso Gastrotrichicha, Crustacea/Ostracoda, 
Crustacea/Copepoda/Harpacticoidea, Nematoda, Turbellaria, Nemertina, 
Archiannelida, Polychaeta ed Oligochaeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα εργαστηρίων, οι σπουδαστές 
θα παρατηρήσουν τα μικρά ζώα που ζουν μεταξύ των σιταριών άμμου.
Η δραστηριότητα περιλαμβάνει έναν κατάλογο υλικών, 
διαδικασιών, και ερώτησης συζήτησης. Συμπληρώνεται με τις 
εικόνες αναφοράς και έναν κατάλογο ειδών και phyla τους, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένου Gastrotrichicha, καρκινοειδή/Ostracoda, 
Crustacea/Copepoda/Harpacticoidea, nematoda, Turbellaria, 
Nemertina, Archiannelida, polychaeta, και Oligochaeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad del laboratorio, los estudiantes
observarán los animales minuciosos que viven entre los granos de la 
arena. La actividad incluye una lista de materiales, de 
procedimientos, y de la pregunta de la discusión. Se suple con 
imágenes de la referencia y una lista de la especie y su phyla, 
incluyendo Gastrotrichicha, Crustacea/Ostracoda, 
Crustacea/Copepoda/Harpacticoidea, Nematoda, Turbellaria, Nemertina, 
Archiannelida, Polychaeta, y Oligochaeta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        </lifeCycle>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
